column1: // This data was authored by me
// The purpose is that the HID codes are numbers mapping to "symbols"
// The simple case is when a symbol is a single character, but not all are.
// A more complicated case is the symbol [Tab]
// This file is to override some symbols in the HID codes to normalize the symbols
// * for single words, make them all caps
// symbols in the HID table that can be characters
// related groups of key codes concise symbols
// symbols in the HID table which we want to remove spaces for
// symbols in the HID table with weird stuff (like parenthetical things)
